resources.string: Are you a doctor or a patient?
Hold down the button to reset the application

Forbidden
 - Operating a vehicle: 24h
 - Touching the nasal canal(!)
 Avoid:\n -Flying: 1-2 weeks\n -Physical activity: 1 week
 -Going to sauna: 1 week\n -Blowing nose with extreme force: 1 week \n Symptoms:\n Normal :\\n Stuffed nasal canals ( use nasal spray or other liquids) \n -Alarming symptoms\n -Strong bleeding\n -Fever over 38 C °\n -Strong pain\n Secretion of foul smelling mucus\n Visible swelling of the nose :\n -> -> IMMEDIATELY contact the treating medical personnel!\n Treatment\n - Regular anti-inflammatory painkillers/n - Nasal drops or sprays can be used during the first nights but nor regularly - Use of nasal jug, multiple times a day: 1-2 weeks \n

Forbidden
 – Operating a vehicle: 24h
 – Touching the nasal canal(!)
 Avoid:
 –Flying: 1–2 weeks
 –Physical activity: 1 week
 –Going to sauna: 1 week
 -Blowing nose with extreme force: 1 week 
 Symptoms:
 Normal :\n Stuffed nasal canals ( use nasal spray or other liquids) 
 -Alarming symptoms
 -Strong bleeding
 -Fever over 38 C °
 -Strong pain
 Secretion of foul smelling mucus
 Visible swelling of the nose :
 -> -> IMMEDIATELY contact the treating medical personnel!
 Treatment
 - Regular anti-inflammatory painkillers/n - Nasal drops or sprays can be used during the first nights but nor regularly - Use of nasal jug, multiple times a day: 1-2 weeks
No plan selected, if you cannot get the camera working write the numbers in the text box below and press the button.

Knee operation 
 Forbidden - Driving: 24h 
- Sauna 
 Avoid: 
- Flying : 1-2 weeks
 - Exercise : 1 weeks 
 - Active moving : 1 weeks 
 - Sauna : 1 week 
 Symptoms
 Normaal :
 - aching (treatment: venyttely verenkierron aktivoimiseksi) - Swelling around the wound
 Critical symptoms 
 - Strong bleeding * 
 - Extreme pain * 
- Troubles while moving the limb * 
 - Strong bleeding, bad smell *
 - Visibly colourful area * * 
 -> -> CONTACT for the treating unit ! 
 Treatment- Next day from the operation rest
 - Gym + exercise according the instructions (picture) should be started and increased weekly "
In case of emergency dial this number.
" Select the plan by either inputting code or using the camera to scan for a qr-code, and pressing the associated button."
Use the smiley buttons to input how well you are feeling. See your own history by pressing the show history button.
Get better soon! Make sure your sympthons are normal.
I hope you get better soon.
